name: CKFetchRecordZoneChangesOperation.ZoneOptions
desc: A configuration object that describes the information to fetch from a record zone.DeprecatedUse CKFetchRecordZoneChangesOperation.ZoneConfiguration instead.

items.name: var desiredKeys: [String]?
items.desc: The fields to fetch for the requested records.

items.name: var previousServerChangeToken: CKServerChangeToken?
items.desc: The token that identifies the starting point for retrieving changes.

items.name: var resultsLimit: Int
items.desc: The maximum number of records to fetch from the record zone.
